Erno Laszlo Soothing Relief Hydration Serum

Brand: Erno Laszlo

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water/eau), Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Squalane, Physalis Pubescens Fruit Juice, Allantoin, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Caesalpinia Spinosa Fruit Extract, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glyc

e Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Bisabolol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Xanthan Gum, Kappaphycus Alvarezii Extract, Salvia Miltiorrhiza Root Extract, Madecassoside, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, De
ons; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
